system.description: Immune to morale checks. If reduced to 0 HP by a non-magical source, DC 12 CON or go to 1 HP. If host body is reduced to 0 HP, tongue-eater emerges from host body and body can no longer be used as a host. If not yet an adult, tongue-eater is a defenseless [[/r 1d3]]-foot-long creature. If an adult, see below.
